reviews: This track has an incredible energy that keeps you moving all night long!
A masterpiece of melody and rhythm, perfect for any playlist.
The artist's voice shines through with raw emotion and passion.
Innovative production that pushes the boundaries of the genre.
Timeless lyrics that resonate deeply with listeners.
Catchy hooks and beats that stick in your head for days.
A sonic journey that takes you on an unforgettable adventure.
Brilliant instrumentation and arrangement make this a standout.
Soulful and heartfelt, this song touches the heart.
Energetic and uplifting, great for boosting your mood.
lyrics:
Every beat reminds me of you, tearing me apart
In the million suns that shine, you're the brightest star
At the break of dawn, you're all I want, no matter how far
Oh darling, I try to move on

Dancing through the night, under neon lights
Your shadow follows me, holding me tight
In this concrete jungle, you're the only sight
That makes my broken heart feel right

Whispers in the darkness, echoes of your name
Playin' with the fire, dancing in the flame
Nothing else matters, we're never quite the same
But I'd do it all again, never felt this pain

Sunrise on the horizon, golden in your eyes
Every moment with you feels like paradise
When the world falls down, you're my only prize
Reaching for forever, beneath the endless skies

Melodies of yesterday, haunting all my days
Caught up in the haze, lost within your gaze
Walking through the memory, stuck within the maze
Searching for a way out, setting hearts ablaze
